data.name: Bound in Time
data.detailed_description:
A heroic journey through time making friends along the way. Starting in the 1990s and launching yourself into the past and future. Full of nostalgic trips backwards and hopeful tomorrows.

Bound in Time might be for you if you like:
  • Trippy turn-based combat
  • Cause and effect time travel events
  • Fun colors!
  • Fond memories of simpler times (with games and with life)

A love letter to the best JRPGs from the SNES era.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
